name: BluetoothRemoteGATTService.getIncludedServices
description: The BluetoothGATTService.getIncludedServices() method returns a Promise to an Array of BluetoothGATTService instances for an optional universally unique identifier (UUID).
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The BluetoothGATTService.getIncludedServices() method returnsa Promise toan Arrayof BluetoothGATTService instancesfor an optional universally unique identifier (UUID).
